name: CAMCO
body:
Castle Age Monster Code Opener, "CAMCO" is a handy tool to open monster code in CA. It converts monster code of CA to monster URL of web3 or facebook page, and opens it for you.

Usage:
1. Select the monster code.
2. Right click the selection.
3. Check the context menu "Castle Age Monster Code Opener" > open or copy the monster URL in either way.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
